title: Deferred MBA admissions program expanded beyond UC Berkeley
author: Kim Girard
excerpt:
Berkeley Haas is expanding its Accelerated Access program, allowing all undergraduate seniors or final-year graduate students to apply for deferred admittance to the full-time MBA program.
